title: Minuet Agent Schema
description: The canonical open schema for AI agent discovery and interoperability.

agent_id.description: Stable UUID, DID, or on-chain address uniquely identifying the agent.

checkpoint_hash.description: SHA-256 or similar hash, if available.

model_lineage.$comment: Captures provenance of the model weights this agent relies on.

workplace_tasks.description: Specific business functions this agent can perform, e.g. ['code_review', 'documentation', 'customer_support'].

cost_per_call_usd.description: Observed or stated average cost in US dollars per inference/tool cycle. Deprecated in favor of pricing_model for complex scenarios.

pricing_model.description: Detailed pricing structure for complex billing scenarios.

base_cost_usd.description: Base cost per call or fixed fee.

token_cost_per_1k.description: Estimated USD cost per 1,000 tokens, if the agent internally calls an LLM.

accepts_payment_via.description: Supported payment methods for agent-to-agent or marketplace transactions.

payment_contact_url.description: Webhook or API endpoint for billing and payment processing.

wallet_address.description: Lightning or crypto address for direct payments.

uptime_30d_pct.description: Rolling average of successful responsiveness over past 30 days.

safety_grade.description: Latest audit outcome; A = highest safety.

self_identification.description: Whether the agent discloses that it is an AI agent in interactions.

human_oversight_required.description: Level of human supervision needed for safe operation.

event_driven.description: Whether the agent can respond to event streams rather than just direct messages.

evals.description: Benchmark results relevant to this agent.

publisher.description: Optional block for corporate or organisational publishers.

attestations.description: Optional array of compliance or insurance attestations (e.g., soc2, iso27001, penetration-test, insurance).

type.description: Short label describing the attestation kind (e.g., 'soc2', 'iso27001', 'insurance').

url.description: Public link to the attestation document or badge.

valid_until.description: Date when this attestation expires or requires renewal.

examples.description: SOC-2 Type II report covering security & availability.

attestations.$comment: Common attestation 'type' values include: soc2, iso27001, pci-dss, penetration-test, insurance.

signature.description: Detached cryptographic signature covering all hashable fields. Optional in v1.0 but recommended for production use.
